document.full_text: hundreds of protesters rallied on friday seeking a full pardon for two sisters freed from prison by mississippi governor haley barbour on the condition that one donate a kidney to the other.
document.title: mississippi sisters freed from prison push for pardon
lines_and_colors: hundreds of protesters rallied on friday seeking a full pardon for two sisters freed from prison by mississippi governor haley barbour on the condition that one donate a kidney to the other.
